questiontext.text:
A record was kept of how many cigarettes from 60 individuals for one month they smoke (rounded) daily. The results are shown in the frequency table

———— —- — — — — — — —- —- —- —- —- ——– Cigarettes 0 1 2 3 4 5 7 10 12 15 20 30 Total Frequency 36 4 3 3 4 2 1 2 1 2 1 1 1 60 ———— —- — — — — — — —- —- —- —- —- ——–

For the median and mode of these numbers:

answer.text: The median is greater than the mode

feedback.text: The median is greater than the mode: Incorrect

answer.text: The median and mode are equal in size

feedback.text: The median and mode are equal in size: Correct

answer.text: The median is smaller than the mode

feedback.text: The median is smaller than the mode: Incorrect

answer.text: The median and mode cannot be compared

feedback.text: The median and mode cannot be compared: Incorrect
